name: meetingmind
description: AI Meeting Assistant with Smart Workflow Automation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cp backend/.env.example backend/.env
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: MeetingMind Team
